0011100011010001 1000111101110011 0 -> sum: 1100100001000100, cout: 0
0111011100001011 1001010111101111 0 -> sum: 0000110011111010, cout: 1
0100001101110100 1100001011000010 1 -> sum: 0000011000110111, cout: 1
1010110011000000 1100111000001101 0 -> sum: 0111101011001101, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
